attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to support our pub heritage. Pubs are, and always have been, an integral part of British culture and community. We, as a nation, need to act NOW to stop the decline of something that is uniquely British. More and more pubs are being forced out of business due to rising rents, increased taxation, and a general failure of the government to support them.
